original_title: キャリアウーマンの湿ったパンスト 紗々原ゆり
overview: Yuri Sasahara was promoted to head office manager. One night, she was working overtime alone in the office when she discovers a voyeur camera set under the desk.  She ends up discovering that Sugiura, a janitor, is responsible. As the guy finds himself cornered he ends up attacking the pretty manager…
title: Moist Pantyhose Of Career Woman Yuri Sasahara
